languages.text: "Кровью еретиков должно омывать палубы флагмана! Как я могу служить Неумирающему, если руки мои связаны клятвой тебе, Домин'{name}?"
"The blood of heretics should wash the flagship's decks! How can I serve the Undying One when my hands are tied by the oath I swore to you, Domin'{name}?"
languages.original_text: "Кровью еретиков должно омывать палубы флагмана! Как я могу служить Неумирающему, если руки мои связаны клятвой тебе, Домин'{name}?"

traits.locale_text: "The flagship's decks should be washed with the blood of heretics! How can I serve the Undying One when my hands are tied by the oath I swore to you, Enim'{name}?"
"The flagship's decks should be washed with the blood of heretics! How can I serve the Undying One when my hands are tied by the oath I swore to you, Enim'{name}?"
"The blood of heretics should wash the flagship's decks! How can I serve the Undying One when my hands are tied by the oath I swore to you, Enim'{name}?"
"The blood of heretics should wash the flagship's decks! How can I serve the Undying One when my hands are tied by the oath I swore to you, Enim'{name}?"
"The blood of heretics should wash the flagship's decks! How can I serve the Undying One when my hands are tied by the oath I swore to you, Domin'{name}?"
"The blood of heretics should wash the flagship's decks! How can I serve the Undying One when my hands are tied by the oath I swore to you, Domin'{name}?"

languages.text: "Das Blut von Ketzern wir das Deck des Flaggschiffs waschen. Wie kann ich dem Todlosen dienen, wenn meine Hände durch den Eid gebunden sind, den ich Euch geschworen habe, Domin'{name}?"
languages.original_text: "The blood of heretics should wash the flagship's decks! How can I serve the Undying One when my hands are tied by the oath I swore to you, Domin'{name}?"

traits.locale_text: "Das Blut von Ketzern wir das Deck des Flaggschiffs waschen. Wie kann ich dem Todlosen dienen, wenn meine Hände durch den Eid gebunden sind, den ich Euch geschworen habe, Domin'{name}?"

languages.text: «¡La sangre de los herejes debería lavar las cubiertas de la nave insignia! ¿Cómo puedo servir al Inmortal cuando mis manos están atadas por el juramento que le prestamos, Domin'{name}?».
languages.original_text: "The blood of heretics should wash the flagship's decks! How can I serve the Undying One when my hands are tied by the oath I swore to you, Domin'{name}?"

traits.locale_text: «¡La sangre de los herejes debería lavar las cubiertas de la nave insignia! ¿Cómo puedo servir al Inmortal cuando mis manos están atadas por el juramento que le prestamos, Domin'{name}?».

languages.text: 「異端者の血で旗艦のデッキを洗うべきだ！あなたへの誓いで手を縛られているのに、どうして不死の者に仕えることができるというのです、ドミン・{name}？」
languages.original_text: "The blood of heretics should wash the flagship's decks! How can I serve the Undying One when my hands are tied by the oath I swore to you, Domin'{name}?"

traits.locale_text: 「異端者の血で旗艦のデッキを洗うべきだ！あなたへの誓いで手を縛られているのに、どうして不死の者に仕えることができるというのです、エニム・{name}？」

languages.text: “我们本该用异端分子的鲜血清洗旗舰的甲板，可我对您的誓言束缚住了我的双手！我该如何侍奉不死之神呢，秘者{name}？”
languages.original_text: "The blood of heretics should wash the flagship's decks! How can I serve the Undying One when my hands are tied by the oath I swore to you, Domin'{name}?"

traits.locale_text: “我们本该用异端分子的鲜血清洗旗舰的甲板，可我对您的誓言束缚住了我的双手！我该如何侍奉不死之神呢，秘者{name}？”

languages.text: « Le sang des hérétiques n'est bon qu'à laver les ponts du vaisseau amiral ! Comment pourrais-je servir l'Immortel quand j'ai les mains liées par mon serment envers vous, Domin'{name} ? »
languages.original_text: "The blood of heretics should wash the flagship's decks! How can I serve the Undying One when my hands are tied by the oath I swore to you, Domin'{name}?"

traits.locale_text: « Le sang des hérétiques n'est bon qu'à laver les ponts du vaisseau amiral ! Comment pourrais-je servir l'Immortel quand j'ai les mains liées par mon serment envers vous, Domin'{name} ? »

languages.text: "Kâfirlerin kanı, sancak gemisinin güvertelerinde akıp gitmeli! Sana ettiğim yeminle elim kolum bağlıyken Ölmeyen'e nasıl hizmet edebilirim Domin'{name}?"
languages.original_text: "The blood of heretics should wash the flagship's decks! How can I serve the Undying One when my hands are tied by the oath I swore to you, Domin'{name}?"
